reviews.text: Had a great experience at Kona Grill at Easton. Great sangria, pad Thai, and service. Audry was a phenomenal server!
Autry was top notch, regarding his attentiveness to our needs. The food and service were outstanding
Had originally thought of a different place for happy hour when I looked at the options for Easton. Extremely happy that we chose Kona. The patio was...
